title: Being Banned due to Computer Crashes?
body: My computer has been crashing a lot lately, and i've been put in low queue for 20 min quite often now. I was wondering if it is possible to get banned though, due to this continually happening. I've bought a 25 dollar League of Legends card, but I don't want to cash it in if I will get banned like in a few days just because of my computer crashing. Also, is there a way to remove my low queues? I wouldn't leave any game on purpose, unless it was one of those really bad games with like everyone flaming me for nothing, or if there's too many trolls. Thank you to anyone who can answer my questions.

replies.body:
Unfortunately, we cannot remove low-priority queues for any reason. Regardless of intention, disconnecting from a match negatively affects everyone in it. This is a key reason as to why disconnections are all treated equally.

Given the context you've provided below in the comments, I recommend you work through our [Bugsplat & Crash guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes), which addresses the most common solutions for these types of crashes. Let me know if those steps caused any change.
Thank you man. I found out that one of the memory chips was corrupt, and I replaced it, and now it doesn't crash anymore.

If you google "Whea_Uncontrollable_Error" you get heaps of forum pages, looks like hardware issue. 
For example:

http://www.tomshardware.co.uk/answers/id-2135979/windows8-whea-uncorrectable-error.html
http://answers.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/forum/windows_10-performance/wheauncontrollableerror/eba4ff44-3fb4-401d-84a0-c9d198df1a95?auth=1

Hello, you can't be banned because of LeaverBuster. You can "only" receive low priority queues again and again if you don't solve your technical issues. That being said, it is impossible to remove the low priority queues:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ#h1q2

Have a look at the Knowledge Base articles in order to fix  these crashes:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes
Thanks for the help and stuff :) for my computer, it always says like Whea_Uncontrollable_Error with like a blue background.

Well I posted something identical a few minutes ago in the wrong page until I read and directed it here thank you for the response I learned they don't care and want me to resolve the issue and if I can't I'm gonna be low priority but didn't start happening until the most recent patch but thanks I guess I just won't get to play.
Okay thanks for the help :) I appreciate it.
